files.patch:
@@ -2889,0 +2889,17 @@ + /** + * If a valid format specifier is found, construct a FormatString and add it to {@link #al}. + * The format specifiers for general, character, and numeric types have + * the following syntax: + * + * 
+         *   %[argument_index$][flags][width][.precision]conversion
+         *
+ * + * As described by the following regular expression: + * + * 
+         *    %(\d+\$)?([-#+ 0,(\<]*)?(\d+)?(\.\d+)?([tT])?([a-zA-Z%])
+         *
+ * + * @return the length of the format specifier. If no valid format specifier is found, 0 is returned. + */ @@ -2890,2 +2907,0 @@ - // %[argument_index$][flags][width][.precision][t]conversion - // %(\d+\$)?([-#+ 0,(\<]*)?(\d+)?(\.\d+)?([tT])?([a-zA-Z%]) @@ -2894,0 +2909,1 @@ + // (\d+\$)? @@ -2895,0 +2911,2 @@ + + // ([-#+ 0,(\<]*)? @@ -2896,0 +2914,2 @@ + + // (\d+)?
